Question: FROM YOUR EYES CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
FiiO

Product 1: R9 Desktop Streamer and Headphone Amp/DAC

 - 64GB onboard storage
 - HDMI ARC and optical connections
 - 2.4GHz / 5GHz Wi-Fi and AirPlay compatibility

Coast Runner

Product 1: CNC Mill

 - Designed for both professionals and hobbyists
 - Aims to make CNC milling technology more accessible
 - Breaks down barriers of traditional CNC milling
Summary_cn:
飞傲

产品1：R9台式机串流器和耳机放大器/DAC

- 64GB内置存储
- 支持HDMI ARC和光纤连接
- 支持2.4GHz / 5GHz Wi-Fi和AirPlay兼容

Coast Runner

产品1：CNC铣床

- 旨在为专业人士和爱好者设计
- 旨在使CNC铣床技术更加易于使用
- 打破传统CNC铣床的障碍
